text: @piersmorgan @MattHancock Nearly choked on my tea when I heard HIM telling all of US to do our ‘civic duty’ 🙈😡🙈😡 Irony is well and truly an expired parrot 🦜 #government #borisjohnsonfailed #coronavirus
